name: Cat vs. Paper
description:
You are a Cat!!

==Feature==

-Cats

-Fun yet challenging gameplay

-Relaxing theme

-Different cat each time you boot up

-Two game modes

-Choose to be good or bad

-Google Play Service support with global leaderboard

**Warning**

The game is very hard
